Summary: Most QM15 express buses will be extended to Arverne during resiliency work on the subway lines serving the Rockaways
Description:
Most QM15 express buses will be extended to Arverne during resiliency work on the subway lines serving the Rockaways
QM15 will continue to make all regular stops in Manhattan and Queens. Buses operating to/from Arverne will make QM17 stops between Cross Bay Blvd at 159 St and Beach Channel Dr at Beach 54 St. (see map)

Extended service will be available during the following days and times (see schedule)
Weekdays:
Manhattan-bound from 6:30 AM to 5:30 PM (except between 7:25 AM and 9:30 AM)
Queens-bound from 10 AM to 11:15 PM

Saturdays
Manhattan-bound from 6:30 AM to 5:30 PM*
Queens-bound from 12:40 PM to 7:40 PM

*Some Manhattan-bound trips between 10:15 AM and 1:30 PM on Saturdays will require a transfer at 157th Ave and Cross Bay Blvd.

Schedule reminder: QM15 buses do not run on Sundays
Learn more about the service changes on the [A] and [H] Lines and the Rockaways Resiliency Project.

Southbound Q38 buses will be detoured from 63rd Rd at 108th St to Colonial Ave at 62nd Dr - no stops will be missed
Buses operate via 108th St, Horace Harding Expressway and Colonial Ave.

Please allow additional travel time.

What's happening?
Construction

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: B7 stops on Kings Highway at E 40th St are permanently closed in both directions
Description:
B7 stops on Kings Highway at E 40th St are permanently closed in both directions
For eastbound service, use the stops on Kings Highway at Flatbush Ave or Avenue K.

For westbound service, use the stops on Kings Highway at Avenue K or Ryder St.

What happened?
Network improvements

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: Eastbound Q4, Q5, Q84 and Q85 stop on Merrick Blvd at 104th Ave is being bypassed, use the stop on Merrick Blvd at 107th Ave instead
Description:
Eastbound Q4, Q5, Q84 and Q85 stop on Merrick Blvd at 104th Ave is being bypassed, use the stop on Merrick Blvd at 107th Ave instead
What's happening?
Bus depot construction

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus

Summary: Northbound M104 stop on Broadway between W 84th St and W 85th St is being bypassed, use nearby stops on Broadway at W 82nd St or W 86th St instead
Description:
Northbound M104 stop on Broadway between W 84th St and W 85th St is being bypassed, use nearby stops on Broadway at W 82nd St or W 86th St instead
See a map of nearby stops.

What?s happening?
New building construction

Summary: Q58 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork on Broadway between Queens Blvd and 80th St.
Description:
Q58 buses are detoured in both directions because of roadwork on Broadway between Queens Blvd and 80th St.
Eastbound stops from Broadway/Justice Ave to Corona Ave/90th St will not be made. 
Board buses along 90th St instead. 
Westbound stops from Corona Ave/91st Pl to Broadway/Queens Blvd will not be made.
Board buses along 92nd St instead. 
Note: Bus arrival information may not be accurate while buses are detoured.

View this link to show how buses will travel while detoured
